title: Why i cant send skin ? Can someone help me

replies.body: There isn't a lot of information to go off here, so I'm assuming you're question is about gifting a friend.  There are quite a few requirements before being able to gift a friend, such as how long you've been on each other's friend list.  Our full list can be found in our [gifting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).  I hope that helps!
